summary: This document is the First Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust, which modifies certain provisions of the original Trust Agreement. It specifically addresses the distribution of trust assets to Karyna Shuliak and allows the trustees to manage these distributions in a manner that protects her rights. The amendment is executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein and notarized.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust and is executing the First Amendment to the trust document.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is named as one of the Trustees responsible for managing the trust and its distributions.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is also named as a Trustee who will manage the trust and its distributions.

persons.name: Katheryn H. Ruemmler
persons.context: Katheryn H. Ruemmler is mentioned as one of the Trustees of the trust.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: Karyna Shuliak is identified as a beneficiary of the trust, with specific provisions made for her distributions.

persons.name: Daphne Wallace
persons.context: Daphne Wallace is the Notary Public who notarized the execution of the First Amendment.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, and Darren K. Indyke serves as a Trustee managing the trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, and Richard D. Kahn serves as a Trustee managing the trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn are both Trustees of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust.
Darren K. Indyke, as a Trustee, is responsible for managing distributions to Karyna Shuliak, the beneficiary.

events.title: First Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust
events.description: The First Amendment modifies the original Trust Agreement to include provisions for the distribution of trust assets to Karyna Shuliak.

keyFacts: The document is an amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2018 Trust.
Karyna Shuliak is identified as a beneficiary of the trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn are named as Trustees responsible for managing distributions.
The amendment allows for distributions to Karyna Shuliak to be made in trust if deemed beneficial.
The document is notarized by Daphne Wallace.
